sqlMap.insert: INSERT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-AUTH-INSERT*/ INTO sso_auth ( auth_code, auth_name, app_id, is_enable, description, last_modifier, gmt_create, gmt_modified ) VALUES (#authCode#, #authName#, #appId#, #isEnable#, #description#, #lastModifier#, now(), now());
sqlMap.update: UPDATE /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-AUTH-UPDATE*/ sso_auth SET auth_code = #authCode#, auth_name = #authName#, app_id = #appId#, is_enable = #isEnable#, description = #description#, last_modifier = #lastModifier#, gmt_modified = now() WHERE id = #id#;
sqlMap.select: SELECT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-AUTH-QUERY*/ id, auth_code, auth_name, app_id, is_enable, description, last_modifier, gmt_create, gmt_modified FROM sso_auth WHERE id = #id#;
SELECT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-AUTH-QUERY-BY-APP-ID*/ id, auth_code, auth_name, app_id, is_enable, description, last_modifier, gmt_create, gmt_modified FROM sso_auth WHERE app_id = #appId#;
SELECT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-AUTH-QUERY-BY-AUTH-CODE*/ id, auth_code, auth_name, app_id, is_enable, description, last_modifier, gmt_create, gmt_modified FROM sso_auth WHERE auth_code = #authCode#;
SELECT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-AUTH-QUERY-BY-AUTH-NAME*/ id, auth_code, auth_name, app_id, is_enable, description, last_modifier, gmt_create, gmt_modified FROM sso_auth WHERE auth_name = #authName#;

SELECT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-AUTH-QUERY-BY-ROLE-NAME*/ b.id as id, b.auth_code as auth_code, b.auth_name as auth_name, b.app_id as app_id, b.is_enable as is_enable, c.description as description, b.last_modifier as last_modifier, b.gmt_create as gmt_create, b.gmt_modified as gmt_modified FROM sso_role a, sso_auth b, sso_role_auth c WHERE a.id = c.role_id AND b.id = c.auth_id AND a.role_name = #roleName# ORDER BY c.gmt_modified DESC

SELECT /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-AUTH-QUERY-BY-APP-ID-AND-USER-NAME*/ e.id AS id, e.app_id as app_id, e.auth_code AS auth_code, e.auth_name AS auth_name, e.description AS description, e.is_enable AS is_enable, e.last_modifier AS last_modifier, e.gmt_create AS gmt_create, e.gmt_modified AS gmt_modified FROM sso_user a, sso_user_role b, sso_role c, sso_role_auth d, sso_auth e, sso_app f WHERE a.id = b.user_id AND b.role_id = d.role_id AND d.auth_id = e.id AND e.app_id = f.id AND a.is_enable = 1 AND e.is_enable = 1 AND a.id = #userId# AND f.app_name = #appName#;
sqlMap.delete: DELETE /*MS-BDSSO-SSO-AUTH-DELETE-BY-DESC*/ FROM sso_auth WHERE description like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #description#), '%');
